name: Old Adventure
description: Run, Jump, Shot and DIE! Explore the world of Old Adventure, a 2D retro-inspired puzzle-platformer where the goal is to help others...but why?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 1.2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
